# color

**Instance Property**

The currently selected color for the color well.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var color: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to get the currently selected color, or to set the current color programmatically.

## Related Documentation

- **Color Programming Topics**

## Managing the selected color

- **takeColorFrom(_:)**: Changes the currently selected color to the color of the specified object.
- **supportsAlpha**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color picker supports alpha values.
